rooms.description: A spacious foyer with a decorative archway leading to the main living areas. Designed with Vastu principles in mind, ensuring entry faces east.

Open-plan area that merges seamlessly with the kitchen and dining space, featuring large windows for ample natural light and ventilation. Vastu guidelines ensure the living room is oriented towards the north.
Open-plan kitchen integrated with the dining/living area, designed with modern Chettinad style elements. Vastu principles dictate that the cooking area should be placed in the southeast direction.
Adjacent to the kitchen, featuring comfortable seating and decorative elements reflective of Chettinad heritage. Vastu placement is complementary to adjacent rooms.
A dedicated guest bedroom, ensuring privacy and comfort with its own ensuite. Placed strategically on the west side as per Vastu to maintain balance.
A generously sized master suite with an attached bathroom, walk-in closet, and a private balcony overlooking the garden. Placed in the northwest to ensure positive energy flow.
A dedicated workspace with proper ventilation and natural light, situated away from noise for concentration. Vastu principles recommend this room be placed in the northeast corner.

openings.description: Two-car garage located adjacent to the ground floor entrance, with direct access to the main living area. Designed in accordance with local building norms and ensuring seamless integration.
A covered outdoor space for relaxation and gatherings, complementing the entrance hall. Vastu principles suggest this be aligned with the northeast to attract positive energy.
Balconies integrated into several living spaces, providing views of the garden. Carefully positioned per Vastu to enhance privacy and energy flow.

rooms.description: Two twin-bedded children bedrooms with ample storage, ensuring comfort and a playful yet serene environment.
A multi-purpose room for additional study space or family activities, equipped with sufficient lighting and ventilation. Vastu recommends placement in the south direction.

openings.description: A central staircase connecting ground and upper floors with safety features and ample space for movement. Designed to adhere to local building norms.
